resources.string: Follow Me Now is an application that allows a person to visualize the path of another. Install Follow Me Now on two Android phones: each one is able to follow the other and be followed by another. Concerned about where your kids are on the way back from school? Want to know if someone is coming or if it is near? This application is for you!
Enter the phone number from who you want to follow:
Enter a number before ask to follow
Error when trying to send SMS
No Internet or db server down!
